LanguageData.RoofTransparent.label: transparent roof
LanguageData.RoofTransparent.description: Transparent roofing lets the light through, but keeps the weather out!
LanguageData.RoofSolar.label: solar roof
LanguageData.RoofSolar.description: Solar roofing generates power on your roof. Requires a Solar Controller to function.
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoof.label: thick stone roof
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoof.description: Thick stone roofing. Helps keep out the drop pods and mortar rounds.
